content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0) with copper ore as input and copper plates as output.

### Copper plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0) with iron ore as input and iron plates as output.

### Copper plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace with no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process.
### Errors when extracting items from furnace
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
### Errors when adding items to furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has enough space to hold the items being added.
### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure that the agent is close enough to the resource to harvest it.
